headline: DeSantis: Biden Will Plunge U.S. Into Recession as Gas Prices Soar
author: Sarah Arnold
sentences:
So its going up and you know, theyre not doing energy in the United States now, they say they want to get money oil from [President Nicolas] Maduro in Venezuela, which all thats gonna do is just line his pockets and actually, itll help Russia.?
He called the move absurd? despite Bidens hypocritical warnings of Russia and its president Vladimir Putin.

Ron DeSantis (R-FL) criticized the Biden administration for reducing American energy independence and going to dictators for assistance, as fuel prices close in to almost $5 a gallon in some parts of Florida for the 9th consecutive day in a row.

The Florida Governor believes because of Bidens mismanagement,? he will plunge this country into a recession.?
Americans are struggling with record gas prices  up over 50% since Biden took office  but he doesnt care.
Rather than expand domestic energy production, he continues to reduce U.S. production capacity (increasing our reliance on foreign oil) by canceling our oil & gas leases.
According to AAA, fuel prices are topping an all time high this week, as the price of gas will set wallets back at least $4 a gallon in all 50 states for the first time.
Desantis called out Bidens bad policies, stressing what a huge failure? pulling out of oil and gas leases have been, such as the one in Alaska.

Source: AP Photo/Marta Lavandier
Americans are feeling even more pain at the pump as gas prices hit a record high nationwide.
The surge, they say is canceling out other factors that would normally create some relief.
AAA told The Hill, this is a result of rising crude oil prices which is at $110 a barrel.
Georgia, Kansas and Oklahoma are three states remaining under the $4 threshold.
The group does not expect to see a lull in prices anytime soon.
America is paying for the lefts disastrous policies.
